item.title: HashiCorp Vault AWS Auth with Amazon EKS and IAM Roles for Service Accounts
item.description: In this tutorial, we are going to configure and explore the HashiCorp Vault AWS Auth method with Amazon EKS. We will start performing the Vault authentication using the EC2 instances (Kubernetes nodes) identity and later we will use a Kubernetes service account to impersonate an AWS IAM Role and have more fine-grained control at the Pod level.
